par _thob pas/__chags pa _med pa'i _gzungs thob pa _zhes _bya'o/__/de ltar _chags pa _med par _gnas pa _la _gnas _nas _'khor ba _dang*_/_mya ngan _las _'das pa _gnyis _mnyam par _sems pa _de _sems can _tu _myur bar _myur _du _rab tu 'gul _lo/__/de'i _'og _tu _shin tu _myur bar _rgyun ring bar _kun _tu _rab tu 'gul _lo/__/de ltar _sbyar _zhing _bshad par _bya'o/__/de nas _gang _gi _tshe _khor yug _dang*_/_khor yug _chen po _la sogs pa _mtha'i _ri _rnams _gyen _du _'phags _te/__mthon por _gyur _cing _dbus _kyi _so na gnas pa _de'i _tshe _ni _mtha' _mtho _na _ni _dbus _dma' bar _gyur _to/__/gang _gi _tshe _dbus _gyen _du _mthon por _gyur _cing*_/_ri _rnams _so na gnas par _gyur pa _de'i _tshe _ni/__dbus _mthon ni _mtha' _dma' bar _gyur _to/__/'jam pa _dang*_/_snum pa _dang sems _can _thams cher _sems _kyi _rgyud _sgog _skya _lta bur _gyur pa _sems _la _dam pa'i chos _kyis _bsgor _mi _btub pa _rnams _te/__de lta bas na _'jig rten gyi khams _'di ni _nyes pa _de _lngas _sun phyung ba'i _phyir _'jig rten gyi khams _'di _na _de las _gzhan pa'i _sangs rgyas _bcom ldan 'das _thams cad _kyis _yongs _su _spangs _nas _sangs rgyas _kyi _zhing _gzhan _du _mngon par rdzogs par _sangs rgyas _so/__/bdag _cag _gi _de bzhin gshegs pa _ni _sngon _byang chub sems dpa'i _spyad pa _spyod pa'i _tshe _'di skad _du/__gzhan _gyis _yongs _su _spangs pa'i _'jig rten gyi khams _gang yin pa _de nyid _du _brtson 'grus _chen po _dang*_/_bzod pa _chen po _dang*_/_thabs mkhas pa _chen pos _sems can _rnams _btul _nas _de nyid _du _bla na med pa _yang dag par _rdzogs pa'i byang chub _mngon par rdzogs par _sangs rgyas par _gyur cig _ces _smon lam _btab _ste/__de bas na _sangs rgyas _bcom ldan 'das _thams cad _kyis _yongs _su _btang ba _yang _bdag _cag _gi _don _du _shin tu _'o brgyal ba _sku nyams _su _bzhes pas _na _bdag _cag _gi _sangs rgyas _bcom ldan 'das _ni _thugs rje chen po _dang ldan pa _yin _no/__/snyigs ma lnga _zhes bya ba _ni _dper na _bska ba'i _ro _dang ldan pa'i _kha zas _sdug bsngal _gyi _rgyur _'gyur _zhing _bza' ba'i _'os _ma yin pa _ltar _'di dag _kyang _de _dang _'dra'o/__/yang _na _ji ltar _sman _gyi _tshigs ma _bska ba _mar _gyi _nang _nas _phyung _nas _dor bar _bya ba _spyad _du _mi _rung ba _de _dang _'dra'o/__/yang _na _ngur smrig _tu _btsos pa _la sogs pa _ji srid _du _ngur smrig _gi _mthu med par _ma _byas pa _de srid _du _tshon _gzhan _'jen [(]'dzin [ )]du _mi _rung ba _ltar _sems can _de dag _kyang _de _dang _'dra bas _na _de dag _gis _snyigs ma _zhes bya ba'i _ming _du _brjod _do/__/de lta bas na _'jig rten _khams _'di ni _skyon _chen po _'di lta bu _dang ldan pa'i _phyir _der _'dong ba'i _byang chub sems dpa' _yongs _su _ma grub pa _rnams _la _sangs rgyas _thams cad _kyis _rjes _su _bstan _cing _gdams pa _mdzad _do/__/dper na _sa chen po _gzhi _mnyam _la _'gro ba'i _mi _rnams _gang _gi _tshe/__tsher ma _dang*_/_gyo mo _dang*_/_rdo _la sogs pas _nyam nga ba'i _sa phyogs _der _nye bar _'gro ba _'di'i _tshe _rjes _su _ma _bstan _na _sngon _gyi _sa _la _'gro ba _'dris pa'i _phyir _de nyid _kyi _tshul _gyis _song _na _sdug bsngal _chen po _myong bar _'gyur ba _de bzhin _du _byang chub sems dpa' _'di dag _kyang _de ltar _'gyur _du _dogs pa'i _phyir _rjes _su _bstan pa _mdzad _do/__/byang chub sems dpa' _de dag _ni _bsnyen par _dka' ba _yin _zhes bya ba'i _tshig _'di ni _byang chub sems dpa' _la _smad pa _gtso _cher _mdzad pa _ma _yin _gyi/__'jig rten gyi khams _la _smad pa _gtso _cher _mdzad pa _nyid _de/__'jig rten gyi khams _de lta bur _ngan pa _der _ni _byang chub sems dpa' _la _yang _dogs pa _skyes par _'gyur _ro _zhes _de _byed/__mchod par _byed _cing _zhes bya ba _la _tshig _gis _bstod pa _byed pa _ni _bsti stang _du _byed pa'o/__/yid _kyis _gus _shing _phangs par _byed pa _ni _bla mar _byed pa'o/__/lus _kyis _thal mo _sbyar _zhing _'dud pa _dang*_/skor ba _byed pa _ni _ri mor _byed pa'o/__/me tog _dang _bdug spos _la sogs pa _mchod pa'i yo byad _rnams _kyis _mngon par _brjod pa _ni _mchod pa _byed pa'o/__/gnod pa _chung _ngam/__nyam nga ba _nyung _ngam/__bskyod pa _yang _ngam/__'tsho 'am/__stobs _dang _ldan _nam _bde ba _la _reg par _gnas _sam _zhes _bsnyun _gsol _zhes bya ba _la/__glo bur _gyi _bsnyun _mi _mnga' bas _na _gnod pa _chung _zhes _bya'o/__/rkyen bzhi _shin tu _brnyes pa'i _phyir _nyam nga ba _nyung ba _zhes _bya'o/__/'gres pa _la sogs pas _khams _nyam chung ba _med pa'i _phyir _dgar bas _na _bskyod pa _yang ba _zhes _bya'o/__/gnod pa _chung ba'i _'bras bu _ni _'tsho ba'o/__/nyam nga ba _chung ba'i _'bras bu _ni _stobs _dang ldan pa'o/__/bskyod pa _yang ba'i _'bras bu _ni _bde ba _la _reg par _gnas pa'o/__/'dir _phyogs _lhag ma _dgu po _rnams _kyang _tshul _'di bzhin _du _brjod par _bya _ste/__brda _phrad _sla ba'i _phyir _'dir _ni _ma _smos _so/__/de'i _tshe _bcom ldan 'das _kyis na/__'gro ba'am/__skye gnas _sam/__skye ba'am/__srid pa'am/__'jig rten _gang _du _'ang mi _bgrang _ngo*_/_/'o na _lus _mngon par grub pa _de _ji 'dra ba _zhig _ce na/__yid las byung ba _ste/__yid las _te/__'chi _'pho _dang _skye ba _yang _de nyid _yin _la/__lus _de nyid _zag pa _med pa'i _dge ba'i _rtsa ba'i _rnam par smin pa _yin pa'i _phyir _'dus byas _yin _te/__'khor ba _zhes _kyang _bya'o/__/'di ltar _bcom ldan 'das _de'i _slad _du _'dus byas _dang _'dus ma byas pa'i _'khor ba _yang _mchis _la/__'dus byas _dang _'dus ma byas pa'i _mya ngan _las _'das pa _yang _mchis _so _zhes _'byung ba _lta bu _ste/__de ltar _na _de bzhin gshegs pa _thabs _la _mkhas pas _nyan thos _'di dag _sngar _dgra bcom par _mdzad pas _nyon mongs pa _spangs _nas _de'i _'og _tu _byang chub kyi lam _la _sbyor bar _mdzad _de/__'di ni _de bzhin gshegs pa _don dam pa'i chos _kyi _dbang phyug _rnams _kyi _phyir mi ldog pa'i _thabs _so/__/ji skad _du _bcom ldan 'das _de bzhin gshegs pas _nyan thos _rnams _la _rgyus _btags _te/__shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _zhes bya bar _bstan _to/__/nyan thos _dang _rang sangs rgyas _rnams _kyi _mthar phyin pa'i _sas _bsdus pa _dgra bcom pa'i _lam _gyi _ye _kyi _dbang _gis _'du byed _rnams _la _bdag med par _rtogs pa'i _phyir _ro/__/'dir _yang _bzod pa _dang*_/_bzod par _bya ba _dang*_/_gnod sems _rnams _mi _dmigs pas _'khor gsum _yongs su dag pa _ni _'og _nas _skabs _ji lta ba _nyid _du _'chad _do/__/lus _dang sems _kyi _brtson 'grus _nyams pa _med pa'i _phyir _zhes bya ba _'dis _ni _brtson 'grus _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _'jug pa _bstan _te/__rgyun _du _chud pa _dang _gus pa _dang _nan tan _du _lus _dang sems _kyi _brtson 'grus _nyams par _mi _byed par _brtson 'grus _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _yongs _su _rdzogs par _bya'o _zhes bya _'dir _sems can _yongs _su _smin par _bya ba'i _skabs _su _gtogs par _yang _bshad _do/__/yang dag par _sdug par _'gyur ba'i chos _drug _ces bya ba _ni _'bum pa _las _'byung _ste/__byams pa'i _lus kyi _mi rtag pa _dang*_/_sdug bsngal ba _dang*_/_stong pa _dang*_/_bdag med pa _nyid _du _rtogs _kyi/__byang chub sems dpa' _rnams _ni _bdag _dang _gzhan _la _phan par _mdzad pa _la _zhugs pa'i _phyir _do/__/nyan thos _dang _rang sangs rgyas _rnams _ni _nyon mongs pa'i _sgrib pa _rnam par dag pa _nyid _thob _nas _phung po'i _lhag ma _med pa'i _mya ngan _las _'das pa _thob par _byed _do/__/byang cad stong pa _yin _na _g.yo ba _dang _mi g.yo ba'i _'gro ba _'di dag _thams cad _la _ci'i phyir _rten _cing _'brel _par _'byung ba _zhes _bya/__med pa _la _ni _rten _cing _'brel _par _'byung ba _mi _'di ltar _gtan _la _'bebs _te/__rten _cing _'brel bar _'byung ba _zhes bya ba'i _chos _ni _gang yang _med _de/__'di ltar _'di dag _ni _shin tu _med pa _yin yang _ji srid _du _yang dag pa _ji lta ba _dngos por _gnas _so/__/las _dang _nyon mongs pa _dang _rnam par smin pa _de dag _kyang _thams cad _kyi _thams cad _du _stong pa nyid _de/__chos _stong pa _rnams _la stong pa _nyid _kyi _rgyu _dang _mig _bslus _nas _glang po che _dang*_/_rta _dang*_/_shing rta _dang*_/_dpung bu chung _dang*_/_ri _dang*_/_'bab chu _dang*_/_rgya mtsho _la sogs pa'i _dngos po _nye bar _ston par _byed _de/__sems can _chos _gzhan _du gyur pa _ni _yod _do/__/'gogs pa'i _bden pa _ni _med _do _zhes _brjod par _mi _nus _te/__bcom ldan 'das _kyis _kyang _dge slong _dag ma _skyes pa _ma _byas pa _ma byung ba/__'dus ma pa'i _lam _gyi _ye shes _ni _sangs rgyas _kyi _mig _go/__/shA ri'i bu _gzhan yang _byang chub sems dpa' _sems dpa' _chen pos _sangs rgyas _bcom ldan 'das _gang dag _phyogs bcu'i _'jig rten gyi khams _'byung bar _zad _do/__/mun pa mun nag _tu _gyur pa _zhes bya ba _ni _'jig rten _gyi _bar _dag _ni _mun pa'o/__/de bzhin gshegs pa'i _spyod lam _la _bslab par _'dod pa _zhes bya ba _ni _sku'i _gsang ba _sa bcu _thob pa'i _spyod yul _yin pas _de skad _bshad _do/__/glang po che'i _lta stangs _zhes bya ba _ni _dam pa _rnams _kyi _lta stangs _te _de dag _ni _steng _na _'dug pa _la _bskyed _de _mi _lta/__'og _nas _'dug pa _la _btud _de _mi _lta/__g.yas g.yon _na _'dug pa _la _ni _mig _bzur _te _mi _lta/__rgyab _na _'dug pa _la _ni _mjing pa _bsgyur _te _mi _lta/__thag ring po _ni _'dug pa _la _bsgrims _te _mi _lta/__thag nye ba _na _'dug pa _la _bsgrims pa _med par _yang _mi _lta'i/__ji ltar _'dug pa'i _spyod lam _dang*_/_ji ltar _lta ba'i _mig _gis _'jig rten gyi khams _thams cad _du _sems can _thams cad _dang*_/_chos _thams cad _la _lta ba _ni _glang po che'i _lta stangs _zhes _'chad _do/__/'gro ba _dang _'greng ba _dang _'dug pa _zhes bya ba _la _byang chub _kyi _snying por _ni _spyod lam _rnam pa _gsum _gyis _bzhugs _so/__/nyal _zhes bya ba _ni _yongs _su _mya ngan _las _'das pa _chen po _ste/__dus _de _gnyis ka _yangs _tha mal pas _ldeg _mi _nus _so _zhes _'chad _do/__/gal te _de bzhin gshegs pa'i _zhabs kyis bcags pa'i _sa gzhi _thams cad _rdo rje _lta bur _gyur _na _ci _nyes _she na/__'dod pa'i yon tan _lnga _'byung bar _mi 'gyur ba'i _phyir _ro/__/sems can _yongs _su _smin par _bya ba'i _phyir _'dod pa'i yon tan _lnga _nye bar _'dzin _zhes bya ba _ni _sa _brgyad pa _la _byang chub sems dpa' _rnams _dgra bcom pa _dang _'dra bar _nyon mongs pa _dang _shin tu _bral _te _de dag _la _nyon mongs pa _kun _tu _'byung ba _shin tu _phra mo _yang _med pas _na _'dod pa'i yon tan _lnga _la _yongs _su _spyod _mi _srid _mod _kyi/__'on kyang _bdag _cag _gi _byang chub sems dpa' _ni _bsdu ba'i _dngos po _la _mkhas pa _ste/__don mthun pas _sems can _rnams _bsdu ba'i _phyir _bud med _nyi khri _bzhi _stong _re re _la _yang _bdag _gi _lus _kyang _de snyed _du _sprul _te/__de dag _thams cad _dga' bar _mdzad _do/__/de bas na _sa _'tshom _la sogs pa _bud med _nyi khri _bzhi _stong _dang*_/_gar mkhan _mo _dgu _stong _dang*_/_de dag _gi _g.yog 'khor _mang po _dang*_/_rga ba _dang*_/_na ba _dang*_/_'chi ba _bstan pa _rnams _dang*_/_lha _dang*_/_tshangs pa _rnams _kyi _nang _na _theg pa gsum _gyis _yongs _su _smin par _ma _mdzad pa _gang yang _med _do/__/de bas na _sems _na/__/'dod pa'i yon tan _dag _la _bdag _'dun _'dod chags _med/__/bud med _khyim _na _gnas pa _bdag _la _mi _mdzes _kyis/__/bdag _ni _nags _kyi _'dab _tu _song _ste _mi smra _bar/__/bsam gtan _ting 'dzin _sgo _nas _sems _zhi gnas _par _bya/__/zhes _gsungs pa _lta bu'o/__/des _yang _de ltar _brtags _nas _thabs mkhas pas _mngon sum _du _mdzad _de/__sems can _yongs _su _smin par _mdzad pa'i _phyir _thugs rje chen po _bskyed _nas/__de'i _tshe _tshigs _su _bcad pa _'di _gsungs _so/__/ku mu da _ni _'dam rdzab _nang _na _skye/__/mi _yis _gang ba'i _nang _nas _rgyal pos _mchod pa _thob/__/gang _tshe _byang chub sems dpa' _g.yog 'khor _mang _brnyes pa/__/de _tshe _sems can _bye ba _khrag khrig _bdud rtsis _'dul/__/byang chub sems dpa' _mkhas pa _gang dag _sngon byung ba/__/kun _gyis _sras _dang _btsun mo _bud med _bsten _gyur _kyang*_/_/'dod pas _chags _med _bsam gtan _bde _las _nyams _ma _gyur/__/de bas _de dag _yon tan _rjes _su _bdag _gis _bslab/__/ces bya ba _la sogs pa'o/__/gal te _'dod _te/__dgos pa'i _dbang _gis _mngal _na _gnas pa'i _tshul _bstan _to/__/sems bskyed pa'i _le'u _ste _gnyis pa'o/__/sems _zhes bya ba _ni _'dir _mngon par _'dod pa _la _bya _ste/__byang chub sems dpa'i _yang _med _cing*_/_gcig _tu _gyur _kyang _'grib pa _med _la/__mang por _gyur _kyang _'phel ba _med _de de _dag _la _kun _nas _nyon mongs pa'am/__rnam par byang bar _gyur pa _cung zad _kyang _med pa _de bzhin _du _kun brtags pa'i _ngo bo nyid _rnams _kyang _shin tu _med pa'i _phyir _skye ba'am/__'gag pa _med _la/__'phel ba _dang*_/_'grib pa _dang*_/_kun _nas _nyon mongs pa _dang*_/_rnam par byang ba _med _do/__/byang chub _kyang _yongs _su _grub pa'i _ngo bo nyid _de/__de yang _shin tu _dben pa _yongs _su _rtog pa _thams cad _las _'das pa _dang*_/_nam mkha' _lta bu _yin pas _skye ba _yang _med/__'gag pa _yang _med _do/__/'phel ba _dang*_/_'grib pa _yang _med _do/__/shin tu _rnam par dag pa _nyid _kyi _phyir _kun _nas _nyon mongs pa _yang _med/__ngo bo nyid _kyis _rnam par dag pa'i _phyir _rnam par byang ba _yang _med _de/__ci'i phyir _zhe na/__gzugs _ni _sgyu ma _lta bu _tshor ba _ni _sgyu ma _lta bu'o _zhes bya ba _la sogs pas _ston _te/__de yang _rnam pa _gnyis _su _ston _to/__/sgyu ma _med pa _dang*_/_sgyu ma _la _'dzin pa'i _rnam par shes pa _med par _'gyur _ro/__sgyu ma _ni _ming tsam _du _zad _de _yul _na _gnas pa _ma _yin/__phyogs _na _gnas pa _yang _ma _yin _bstan pa'i _'gres _ni _shA ri'i bu _byang chub sems dpa' _ni _'di _snyam _du _sems _te _zhes bya ba _nas/__sems can _rnams _yongs _su _mya ngan _las _bzla'o _snyam _du _sems _so _zhes bya ba'i _bar cad _la _mnyam pa _nyid _ces bya ba _ni _gang zag _stong pa nyid _kyi _btang snyoms tshad med pa'o/__/chos _thams cad _mnyam pa _nyid _ces bya ba _ni _chos _stong pa nyid _kyis _dbu mar _gnas pa'i _btang snyoms _te/__'di ni _rjes _su _chags pa _dang _khong khro ba _med pa'i _btang snyoms _zhes _bya'o/__/de'i _'og _tu _'khor _rnams _yongs _su _smin par _gyur pa _lung bstan pa _dang*_/_shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _bsngags pa _dang*_/_de _la _zhugs pa'i _byang chub sems dpa' _bsngags pa _dang*_/_'od zer _'gyed pa _dang*_/_byang chub sems dpa' _'dus pa _dang*_/mchod pa'i _bkod pa _dang*_/_'khor sa _brgyad _thob pa _dang*_/_smon lam _dang*_/_lung bstan pa _dang*_/_'di dag _thams cad _ni _gzhung las _'byung ba _bzhin _te/__don _gsal _lo/__/de ltar _tshig _dang pos _mdor bstan pa _bshad _do/__/shA ri'i bu _'di _la _byang chub sems dpa' _sems dpa' _chen po _chos _thams cad _rnam pa thams cad _du _mngon par rdzogs par _byang chub par _'dod pas _shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin _byed pa _gang yin pa _rnams _kyis _rab _tu _dbye ba _de dag _bcom ldan 'das _dang _gnas brtan _shA ri'i bus _rgyas par _bstan _nas/__da ni _brtson pa _la _gdams pa _gang yin pa _dang*_/_brtson pa'i _phan yon _gang yin pa _la sogs pa _bshad par _bya ba _rnam pa _bzhi _las/__gnas brtan _rab 'byor _gyis _brtson pa _la _gdams pa _bstan _to/__/bcom ldan 'das _kyis _kyang _thabs mkhas pas _de ltar _yongs _su _smin par _bya ba'i _'dul ba _las _brtsams _te _bstan _to/__/de nyid kyi phyir _shA ri'i bus _'di ni _de bzhin gshegs pa _nyid _kyi _thabs _la _mkhas pa'i _tshul _gyis _byang chub sems dpa' _la sogs pa _kun brtags pa'i _chos _rnams _dang*_/_sangs rgyas _kyi _chos _yongs su dag _par _bya ba'i _thabs mkhas pa'i _mthar thug pa'i _bar _dag _la _mngon par _zhen par _mi _byed _do _zhes bya ba'i _tha tshig _go/__/de bzhin nyid _la _mngon par _zhen par _'gyur ba _med _do/__/yang dag pa'i _mtha' _la _mngon par _zhen par _'gyur ba _med _do/__/chos _kyi _dbyings _la _mngon par _zhen par _'gyur ba _med _do _zhes bya ba _ni _sngar _smos pa'i _rim pas _lam _gyi _rnam pa _shes pa _nyid _kyi _spyod yul _byang chub sems dpa'i _sas _bsdus pa _ni _de bzhin nyid _ces _bya'o/__/thams cad _shes _sar _gtogs pa'i _chos _kyi _sku _ni _chos _kyi _dbyings _zhes _bya'o/__/de nas _yang _mngon par _zhen pa _med par _bsgom pa'i _phan yon _ni/__rab 'byor _de ltar _byang chub sems dpa' _sems dpa' _chen _ste/__bcom ldan 'das _bdag _gis _dngos po _ma 'tshal/__ma _dmigs _yang dag par _rjes _su _ma _mthong _bzhin _du _chos _gang _gis/_chos _gang _la _rjes _su _gdams _shing _bstan par _bgyi _zhes bya ba 'byor _gyi _dgongs pa _ni _byang chub sems dpa' _chen po _zhes bya ba _'di _la _chags pa _med pa _dang*_/_thogs pa med pa _che ba'i _phyir _sems dpa' _chen po _zhes _bya _ste _de nyid kyi phyir/__sems _de _la _yang _chags pa _med _ces bya ba _la sogs pas _de _la _chags pa _med par _gnas pa _yin par _bstan _to/__/gnas brtan _gang po'i _dgongs pa _ni _go cha _chen po _bgos pa _dang*_/_sgrub pa _chen _mi _dmigs par _yid la byed pa _dag _yang dag par _zhugs pa _yin _no _zhes bya ba _ni _lnga pa'o/__/de nas _mi _g.yeng _zhing _mnyam par gzhag pa _dag _theg pa chen po'i _yin pa _dang*_/_de _shes pa _dag _la _bsdus pa _ni _bskum pa'o/__/bsrang ba _ni _brkyang ba'o/__/chos gos _chen po _ni _snam sbyar _ro/__/de las _gzhan pa'i _gos _ni _chos gos _so/__/bslang ba'i _snod _ni _lhung bzed _do/__/zos pa _ni _'bras chan _la sogs pa'o/__/'thungs pa _ni _btung ba _la sogs pa'o/__/'chos pa _ni _khur ba _la sogs pa'o/__/myangs pa _ni _'o ma _dang*_/_zho _dang _bu ram _la sogs pa'o/__/lam _du 'gro ba _la sogs pa'am/__tsha bas _gdungs pa _la sogs pas _dus ma yin pa'i _gnyid _kyis _non pa _la _phyogs _su _lta ba _dang _chus _gdab pa _dang*_/_gdong _phyi ba _la sogs pa _ni _gtsang ba'o/__/bcag pa _la ba'o/__/mel tshe _thun _lnga _ni _gnyid _kyis _ma _log pa'o/__/chos 'chad pa'i _yang dag pa'i _gtam _la sogs pa _ni _smra ba'o/__/ji ltar _thos _shing _bzung ba'i _chos _rnams _kyi _don _sems _shing _'jal ba _la sogs pa _ni _mi smra ba'o/__/lhag mthong _dang _zhi gnas _la _mngon par _brtson pa _ni _nang _du _yang dag par _'jog _ces _bya'o/__/dbugs _rngub pa _dang _'byung ba'i _sgo gsum _la _dran _yang dag par _rjes _su _mthong ba'i _sems rtse gcig _tu _gyur pa _gang yin pa _de _ni _stong pa nyid _kyi _ting nge 'dzin _to/__/yongs _su _grub pa'i _dngos po _gang yin pa _de nyid _yongs _su _rtog pa _dang*_/_rnam par rtog pa'i _spros pa _thams cad _kyi _mtshan ma'i _rnam pa _dang _bral ba _nam mkha' _bzhin _du _mtshan ma med pa'i _rnam par _zhi ba _nyid _du _yid la byed pa'i _sems rtse gcig _tu _gyur pa _gang yin pa _de _ni _mtshan ma med pa'i _ting nge 'dzin _to/__/yang _gzhan _gyi _dbang _gis _yongs _su _grub pa'i _dngos po _de nyid _bzung _nas/__de ltar _shin tu _yongs su dag pa'i _dngos po _la _gzhan _gyi _dbang _gis _yongs _su _rtog pa'i _spros pa _las _byung ba'i _nyon mongs pa _rnams _kyis _nye bar _nyon mongs pa _ni _smad pa _yin _no _snyam _nas _de _la _mi mthun par _'du pa'i _ting nge 'dzin _to/__/de _la _kun brtags pa _rnams _mtshan nyid _med par _mthong ba _ni _stong pa nyid _kyi _ting nge 'dzin _to/__/yongs _su _grub pa _la _zhi ba'i _mtshan nyid _du _mthong ba _ni _mtshan ma med pa'i _ting nge 'dzin _to/__/gzhan _gyi _dbang _la _mi mthun par _mthong ba _ni _smon pa _med pa'i _ting nge 'dzin _to/__/de _la _kun brtags pa'i _mtshan nyid _rnams _shin tu _med pa'i _phyir/__chos _thams cad _kyi _rang gi mtshan nyid _stong pa nyid _du _so sor _rtog pa'i _tshe/__sems _gnas pa _gang yin pa _de _ni _stong pa nyid _kyi _rnam par _thar pa'i _sgo _ste/_'di ni _stong pa nyid _kyi _ting nge 'dzin _zhes _bya'o _zhes _gsungs _so/__/yongs _su _grub pa'i _mtshan nyid _kyis _chos _thams cad _mtshan ma med pa'i _mtshan nyid _yin pas/__chos _thams cad _mtshan ma _shes pa bcu _gcig po _rnams _ni _theg pa chen po _ste/__de _la _'di ni _sdug bsngal _lo/__/'di ltar _sdug bsngal _kun 'byung _ngo/__/'di ltar _sdug bsngal _'gog pa'o/__/'di ltar _sdug bsngal _phyis _mi _skye'o _zhes bya ba _ni _sdug bsngal shes pa'o/__/rnam pa _bzhir _gyur _du _zin _kyang _tha ma _bzung _nas/__phyi ma _la _sdug bsngal _mi _skye _zhing _rgyun _chad _do _zhes _de ltar _zhugs pa'i _ni _rjes _su _rtogs pa'i _shes pa _zhes _bya'o/__/kha cig _kho nar _kun brtags pa _la _dmigs pa'i _phyir _pha rol gyi sems _shes pa _la _kun rdzob shes pa _zhes _bya'o/__/yongs _su _'dris pa _shes pa _bsam gtan dang po _dang*_/_gnyis pa'i _rang bzhin _no/__/rnam par _thar pa _gsum pa _ni _bsam gtan bzhi pa'i _rang bzhin _te/__de yang _chags pa _med pa'i _ngo bo nyid _do _zhes _'chad _do/__/'di _la _yang _bsam gtan dang po _'dod pa _na _spyod pa'i _kha dog _la _'dod chags pa'i _gnyen por _nang _gi _skra _la sogs pa _la _dmigs pa'i _snyoms par 'jug pa _la _snyoms par _zhugs _nas _de'i _'og _tu _bzhi pa _ni _gzhan _gyi _don _las _brtsams pa'o/__/dge sbyong _dang _bram ze _zhes bya ba _la sogs pa _la/__shes rab _kyis _mngon pa'i nga rgyal _byed pa'i _phyir/__dge sbyong _dang _bram ze _smos _so/__/lha'i mig _dang _pha rol gyi sems _shes pa _la sogs pa _phun sum tshogs pa'i _phyir _lha _dang*_/_bdud _smos _so/__/rdzu 'phrul _dang _mthu _che ba'i _phyir _tshangs pa _rnams _smos _so/__/rgyu _de yang _dag par _rjes _su _mi _mthong _ste _zhes bya ba _ni _de dag _gis _brgal ba'i _rgyur _'gyur ba _'gal ba _de _cung zad _kyang _mi _mthong _zhes bya ba'i _tha tshig _go/__/bde ba _thob _ces bya _sgrog _ste/__gsung _gi _phrin las _rnam par dag pa'i _phyir _ro/__/mi _'jigs pa _thob _ces bya ba _ni _thugs _la _dogs pa _dang*_/_zhum pa _la sogs pa _med par _bstan _to/__/de'i _dbang _gis _tshangs pa'o/__/gang dag _gis _'jig rten _gyi _phyir _sbyin pa _zhes bya ba _ni _'dod pa'i yon tan _lnga _'jig rten _gyi _phyir _sbyin pa'o/__/gang dag _gis _'jig rten _las _'byung bar _mi 'gyur ba _zhes bya ba _ni _'khor ba'i _'jig rten _las _so/__/gang dag _'jig rten _'byung bar _'gyur ba _zhes bya ba _ni _so so'i _skye bo'i _'jig rten _te/__'byung ba _ni _'phel ba'i _phyir _ro/__/gang dag _'jig rten _du _'byung bar _'gyur ba _zhes bya ba _ni _snod kyi 'jig _rten _du _sems can _gyi _'jig rten _'byung _ngo*_/_/gang dag _gis _'jig rten _sgrol ba _zhes bya ba _ni _sems can _gyi _'jig rten _no/__/gang _du _gnas pa _ni _shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _gnas pa'o _zhes _bstan _to/__/gnas par _mi _bya ba'i _'gres _la _yang _rnam pa _gsum _du _bstan _te/__chos _la _gnas par _mi _bya _zhes bya _de _dmigs _su _med pa'o _zhes bya ba _la _gnyis su med pa _ni _yongs _su _grub pa _ste/__dmigs _shing kun _brtags pas _mngon par _zhen par _mi _'gyur _ro/__/gang _dmigs _su _med pa _de _len pa _med pa'o _zhes bya ba _ni/__gang _dmigs pa'i _tshul _gyis _mngon par _zhen par _mi 'gyur ba _de _rnam par rtog pa'i _yid la byed pas _nye bar len par _mi _'gyur _ro _zhes bya ba'i _tha tshig _go/__/de nas _yang _shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa'i _yon tan _dpag tu med pa _dang*_/_tshul khrims _kyi _phung po _la sogs pa _tshad med pa'i _rgyur _gyur pa _dang*_/_nyan thos _dang _rang sangs rgyas _kyi _so/__/'di ni _gnyis su med pa'i _don _to _zhes bya ba _la/__don _ces bya ba _'di ni _brjod par _bya ba'i _rnam grangs _dang*_/_dmigs pa'i _rnam grangs _te/__gnyis su med pa _'di ni _bshad pa'i _shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa'i _brjod par _bya ba'i _don _dang _rnam par mi rtog pa'i _shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _dmigs pa'i _tshe _shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa'i _don _ni _ston _to/__/de'i _'og _tu _phyogs bcu'i _sangs rgyas _thams cad _la _bde ba'i _yo byad _thams cad _kyis _mchod pa _byas pa'i _bsod nams pas _'di _bshad pa'i _bsod nams _che ba'i _'gres _dang*_/_bskal _gzugs _kyi _sngon gyi mtha' _ma _bcings _ma _grol ba _zhes bya ba _ni _chos nyid _kyi _gzugs _'khor ba _na _dri ma _dang bcas pa _ma dag pa'i _gnas skabs _la _sngon gyi mtha' _zhes _bya'o/__/da ltar _rgyun _tu _zhugs pa/__lnga _brgya bzhi pa _la _lhag mthong*_/_lnga pa _la _ting nge 'dzin/__drug pa _la _tshul khrims/__bdun pa _la _chos mngon pa/__brgyad pa _la _mdo sde/__dgu pa _la _'dul ba/__lnga _brgya _bcu pa _la _rtags _tsam _ste/__'di nyid _la _brgya pa _tha ma _zhes _bya'o/__/kha cig _na re _mi _rnams _kyi _tshe'i _tshad _mi lo _lnga _brgya _thub _ste _de _la _lo _lnga _bcu pa _snga ma _la _ni _mi _rnams _kha dog _dang _gzugs _dang _stobs _dang*_/shes rab _la sogs pa _mngon par _'phel ba _yin _la _lnga _bcu pa _phyi ma _la _ni _'grib pa _yin _no/__/de bzhin _du dus _kyi _mtha' _bstan pa _'grib pa'i _dus _kyang _lnga _bcu pa _phyi ma _dang _'dra bas _lnga _brgya pa _tha ma _zhes _gdags _so _zhes _zer _ro/__/yon tan _gyi _phan yon _thams cad _bstan pa _ni _brda _phrad _sla'o/__/bdud _kyi _las _rnams _ni _spobs pa _phyis _te _skyes _na _thogs par _'gyur ba _dang*_/_spobs pa _ha cang _myur bar _skyes _na _nga rgyal can _du _'gyur ba _dang*_/_ma _gus par _byed pa _ngo*_/_/gzugs _ni _sngon gyi mtha' _dang _phyi ma'i mtha' _yongs _su _chad pa'o _zhes bya ba _ni _gzugs _ni _sngon gyi mthar _don dam par _nam yang _ma _byung*_/_phyi ma'i mthar _yang _don dam par _sems/__sems can _'di dag _yun ring po _nas _ngar 'dzin pa _dang _nga yir 'dzin pa _la _spyod _dam _zhes bya ba _la sogs pas _'di skad _bstan _te/__chos _thams cad _ngo bo nyid _kyis _dben _zhing _ngo _nyid _do/__/nam mkha' _dben pa'i _phyir _zhes bya ba _ni _nam mkha' _dben pa'i _rnam pas _so/__/'di _yang _'gres _gsum _ste/__nam mkha' _dang sems _can _mthun pa'i _'gres _dang*_/_nam mkha' _lta bu'i _med pa'o/__/bsgom par _yang _mi _bgyi/__rnam par _gzhig pa _yang _mi _bgyi _zhes bya ba _ni _mngon par _'du byed pa _med pa _la _slob pa _ste/__bsgom par _bya/__bskyed par _bya _snyam pa'i _mngon par _stong _zhes bya ba _ni _kun brtags pa'i _gzugs _ni _gzugs _nyid _du _med pa'o/__/gzugs _kyi _mtshan nyid _kyis _stong pa'i _phyir _ro/__/spyod pa _med pa _ni _byang chub sems dpa'i _shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _spyod pa'o _zhes bya ba _ni _thams cad _dmigs _su _med pa'i _phyir _gang _la _yang _mi spyod pa _nyid _spyod pa'o/__/gal te _spyod pa _ma mchis pa _byang chub sems dpa'i tshig _go/__/dmigs pa _dang _mi _dmigs pa _mnyam pa _nyid _ni _mi _dmigs pa _ste _zhes bya ba _ni _chos _thams cad _dmigs _su _yod pa _dngos po _gang yin pa _dang*_/_chos _thams cad _dmigs _su _med pa _do/__/dmigs _su _med pa _yang _dngos po med pa'i _bdag nyid _yin pas _ngo bo nyid _med _de/__de bas na _gnyi ga _yang _ngo bo nyid _med par _mtshungs _te/__dmigs _su _yod pa _dang*_/_dmigs _su _med _dang*_/_dbus _dmigs _su _med pa _smos _la/__da ni _dgra bcom pa _dag _'dus ma byas _kyis _rab _tu _phye bar _'gyur _na/__'khor ba'i _phyi ma'i mtha' _yod par _'gyur _ro _snyam _du _dgongs _nas _zhus pa'o/__/rab 'byor _'jig rten _gyi _tha snyad _tshad mar _byas _kyi _don dam par _ni _ma _yin _no _zhes bya ba _ni _so so skye bo _rnams _dang*_/_dgra bcom pa _rnams _kyi _de bzhin nyid _ni _dus _thams _de lta bu _dag _bshad _do _zhes _bstan pa'o/__/de bas na _gang dang gang _gis _mtha' _chad pa _zhes bya ba _gsungs _so/__/bcom ldan 'das _chos _thams cad _rang gi mtshan nyid _kyis _stong pa _la _sngon gyi mtha' _mi _dmigs _na/__phyi ma'i mtha' _smos _kyang _ci _'tshal _zhes bya ba _ni _kun brtags pa _phung po _lnga'i _chos _dngos po med pa'i _ngo bo nyid _yin pa'i _phyir _rang gi mtshan nyid _yod _ces _gsungs pa'o/__/rab 'byor _de de bzhin _no/__/de de bzhin _te _zhes bya ba _ni _chos _thams cad _skye ba _med _cing _'gag pa _med pa'i _phyir _de'i _tshig _la _rjes _su _yi rang ba'o/__/rab _sku'i _tshul _ni _de _ni _sangs rgyas _bcom ldan 'das _rnams _kyi _byang chub _ste/__de'i _phyir _byang chub _ces _bya'o _zhes _gsungs pa'o/__/yongs _su _grub pa'i _mtshan nyid _rtogs pa _ni _de _ni _sangs rgyas _bcom ldan 'das _rnams _kyis _mngon par rdzogs par _sangs rgyas _na _de'i _phyir _byang chub _ces _bya'o _zhes _gsungs pa'o/__/shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _spyod pa'i _byang chub _ni _chos _gang yang _bstsags pa'i _phyir _ram/__'grib par _bya ba'i _phyir _zhes bya ba _ni _sbyin pa _la sogs pa'i _dge ba'i _rtsa ba _rnams _bstsags pa'i _phyir _ram/__ser sna _dang _'chal pa'i _tshul khrims _la sogs pa _'grib par _bya ba'i _phyir _ram/__nag po'i _phyogs _rnams _nyams par _bya ba'i _phyir _ram/__dkar po'i _phyogs _rnams _'phel bar _bya ba'i _phyir _ram/__sangs rgyas _kyi _chos ma _skyes pa _rnams _bskyed par _bya ba'i _phyir _ram/__kun _nas _nyon mongs pa _skyes pa _rnams _dgag pa'i _phyir _ram/__dri ma _dang bcas pa'i _gnas skabs _na _kun _nas _nyon mongs par _bya ba'i _phyir _ram/__dri ma med pa'i _gnas skabs _na _rnam par byang bar _bya ba'i _phyir _dmigs pa'i _tshul _gyis _nye bar gnas pa _ma _yin _no _zhes bya ba _la/__byang chub _ni _dmigs pa _thams cad _sel ba'i _rang bzhin _yin pa'i _phyir _de skad _ces _gsungs _so/__/gnyis _kyi _tshul _gyis _sbyin pa'i _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _spyod _ces bya ba _ni _dmigs par _bya ba _dang _dmigs par _byed pa'i _dngos pos _zhes bya ba'i _tha tshig _go/__/de ltar _dge ba'i _rtsa ba _dang ldan pa'i _phyir _byang chub sems dpa' _yang _rnam pa thams cad _mkhyen pa _nyid _thob par _mi _nus _zhes bya ba _ni _byang chub _la _dmigs _nas _sbyin pa _byin _na _sbyin pa'i _pha rol _tu _phyin pa'i _ming _du _'gyur _ro _snyam _nas _gsol pa'o/__/gnyis _kyi _tshul _gyis _sbyin pa'i _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _mi spyod _do _zhes bya ba _ni _'di _byang chub _kyi _phyir _bya'o _zhes _dmigs par _bya ba _dang _dmigs par _byed pa _gnyis _kyi _dngos por _rnam par _brtags _nas _mi spyod _do _zhes bya ba'i _tha tshig _go/__/bcom ldan 'das _gal te _gnyis _kyi _tshul _gyis _sbyin pa'i _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _mi spyod _na _zhes bya ba _ni _gal te _gnyis _kyi _tshul _gyis _byang chub _kyi _phyir _yongs _su _sngo _zhing _mi _byed _na _ji ltar _dge ba'i _rtsa ba _rnams _mngon par _'phel bar _'gyur _zhes _zhus pa'o/__/rab 'byor _gang _gnyis _la _spyod pa _de dag _ni _dge ba'i chos _rnams _rnam par _'phel bar _'gyur _ro _zhes bya ba _ni _gnyis su med par _spyod pa _nyid _dge ba'i _rtsa ba _'phel ba'i _rgyu _yin _gyi _gnyis _su _spyod pa _ni _ma _yin _no _zhes _bstan pa _ste/__'di ni _gnyis su med par _spyod pa'i _shes rab _kyi _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _zhes _bya'o/__/de nas _yang _thabs mkhas pas _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _drug _la _spyod pa _dang*_/_byang chub _kyi _phyogs _la _spyod pa _dang*_/_sangs _ma yin pa'i _phyir _'di _la _shes par _byed pa _med _do/__/ji ltar _dngos po _dang _dngos po med pa _yang _ma yin pa _de ltar _mnyam pa _nyid _mthong ba _ni _mngon par _rtogs pa _zhes bya ba _ni _sgyu ma _byas pa _bzhin _te _kun brtags pa _ni _dngos po'i _rnam pa _ma _yin _la _ri bong _gi _rwa _ltar _shin tu _med pa'i _rnam pa _yang _ma _yin _no/__/dngos po _dang _dngos po med pa _mnyam pa _nyid _gang yin pa _de _ni _dngos po _dang _dngos po med pa _mnyam pa _nyid _mthong ba _mngon par _rtogs pa _zhes _bya _ste/__'di ni _spros pa _med pa'i _pha rol _tu _phyin pa _zhes _bya'o/__/rab 'byor _'di lta ste _dper na/__dgra bcom pas _lam _thams cad _la _bslabs _nas _zhes bya ba _ni _rgyun _du _zhugs pa _dang*_/_lan cig _phyir 'ong ba _dang _phyir _mi _'ong ba _dang*_/_dgra bcom pa'i _lam _la _bslabs _nas _so/__/yang dag pa _nyid _skyon med pa _la _'jug _ste _zhes bya ba _ni _dgra bcom pa _nyid _kyi _skyon med pa _'jug pa'o/__/re zhig _lam _gyi _skad cig _la _dgra bcom pa'i _lam gyi 'bras bu _ma _thob _kyi _bar _du _zhes bya ba _ni _ji srid _du _tha ma _la _rnam par grol ba'i _lam _gyi _skad cig _mi _skyed _ces bya ba'i _tha tshig _go/__/skad cig _gcig _dang ldan pa'i _shes _khong _du _chud par _bya ba'i _thabs _su kun _rdzob _tu _'di _mdzad _de/__rim pa _'dis _shes par _gyur _nas _de bzhin _du _bsgrubs pas _'tshang rgya bar _'gyur _ro/__/'phags pa'i chos _'dul ba _zhes _'og _tu _bcom ldan 'das _chos _thams cad _rmi lam _lta bu _dngos po _ma mchis pa'i _ngo bo nyid _kyi _rang gi mtshan nyid _kyis _stong pa _rnams _la _zhes bya ba _la sogs pa _zhus pa _dang*_/_lan _dang _ngo mtshar _rmad _du _byung ba _bstan pa _dang*_/_'jig rten _dang _'jig rten _las _'das pa'i _chos kyi sbyin pa _dag _kyang _gzhung _nyid _las _gzung bar _bya'o/__/de _la _'jig rten _las _'das pa'i _chos kyi sbyin pa _bstan pa'i _lhag ma _ni _sngar _bstan _zin _te/__sngar _ma _bstan pa _dag _bstan _to/__/de _la _nyon mongs pa _med pa _gang zhe na _zhes bya ba _ni _bdag _gi _phyir _gzhan dag _thag _tu _shes pa _gang _gi _shes par _gyur pa _de _smon lam _sngon du 'gro ba'i _shes pa _yin pas _smon _nas _shes pa _zhes _bya'o/__/de _la _yongs su dag pa _bzhi _gang zhe na _zhes bya ba _la/__sems can _thams cad _kyi _nyon mongs pa'i _gnas ngan len _thams cad _gnas _dang _shin tu _bral bar _gyur pa _dang*_/_bdag _gi _lus _kyang _ji ltar _'dod pa _bzhin _len pa _dang*_/_gnas pa _dang _'chi 'pho ba _rnams _la _rang dbang _du gyur pa _ni _gnas _yongs su dag pa'o/__/sprul pa _dang*_/_yongs _su _bsgyur ba'i _grangs _su _gtogs pa _dang*_/_dmigs pa _thams cad _la _dbang _du gyur pa _ni _dmigs pa _yongs su dag pa'o/__/sems _kyi _gnas ngan len _thams cad _dang _bral bas _sems _la _rnam pa thams cad _du _dge ba _'phel ba _ni _sems _yongs su dag pa'o/__/ma rig pa'i _phyogs kyi gnas _ngan _len _thams cad _dang _bral bas _shes par _bya ba _thams cad _la _shes pa _sgrib pa _med pa _dbang _du gyur pa _ni _ye shes _yongs su dag pa'o/__/de _la _dbang bcu _gang zhe na _zhes bya ba _la _ji srid _'dod pa _de srid _du _'dug pa _ni _tshe la dbang ba'o/__/bsam gtan _dang _tshad med pa _dang*_/_rnam par _thar pa _la sogs pa _sems _gnas pa _gang _gis _gnas par _'dod pa _des _ji ltar _'dod pa _bzhin _gnas pa _'di ni _sems la dbang ba'o/__/kun _du _brtags pa _tsam _gyis _de ma thag _tu/__de'i _bza' ba _la sogs pa _yo byad _thams cad _ji ltar _'dod pa _bzhin _'byor pa _'di ni _yo byad _la _dbang ba'o/__/skye bar _'gyur ba'i _las _thams cad _la _ji ltar _'dod pa _bzhin _du _bsgyur ba _'di ni _las la dbang ba'o/__/skye ba'i _gnas _thams cad _du/__gang _du _'dod par _ji ltar _'dod pa _bzhin _du _skye ba 'di _ni _skye ba _la _dbang ba'o/__/dngos po _gang dang gang _ji ltar _mos par _byas pa _de dag _de bzhin _du _'grub pa _'di ni _mos pa _la _dbang ba'o/__/de'i _smon lam _thams cad _ji ltar _'dod pa _bzhin _du _'grub pa _'di ni _smon lam _la _dbang ba'o/__/rdzu 'phrul _gyi _dgos pa _thams cad _ji ltar _'dod pa _bzhin _du _'grub pa _'di ni _rdzu 'phrul _la _dbang ba'o/__/gang yang _shes par _bya ba'i _dngos por _rab _tu _zab pa _shes par _'dod pa _de dag _myur ba _nyid _du _shes pa _'di ni _ye shes _la _dbang ba'o/__/ming gi tshogs _dang*_/_tshig gi tshogs _dang*_/_yi ge'i _tshogs _rnams _ji ltar _'dod pa _bzhin _thob pa _dang*_/_chos _thams cad _yang dag par _rnam par _dgod pa _la _mkhas pa _'di ni _chos la dbang ba'o/__/de _la _de bzhin gshegs pa'i _bsrung ba _med pa _gsum _gang zhe na _zhes bya ba _la _srung ba _med pa _gsum _ni _gzhung _nyid _las _go _sla'o/__/rjes _su _chags pa _dang*_/_khong khro ba _med pas _dran pa _nye bar _gzhag pa _gsum _ni _go _sla'o/__/bsnyel ba _mi _mnga' ba'i _chos nyid _ces bya ba _ni _gang dang gang _gi _tshe _ji ltar _sems can _gyi _don _mdzad pa _de'i _tshe/__de bzhin gshegs pa _de bzhin _du _sgrub pa _ni _bsnyel ba _mi _mnga' ba'i _chos nyid _do/__/skyes bu chen po'i _mtshan _sum _cu _rtsa _gnyis _zhes bya ba _ni _gzugs _tshad mar _'dzin pa'i _gang zag _rnams _dad pa _bskyed pa'i _phyir _rnam par _dgod _do/__/de _la _rigs _dang _bsam pa _dang*_/_mos pa _dang*_/_smon lam _dang*_/_brtson 'grus _rtsom pa _dang*_/_'jug pa _dang*_/_yang dag par _'grub pa _dang*_/_shes rab _dang*_/_thabs _la sogs pa _che bas _skyes bu'i _byed pa _che ba'i _phyir _byang chub sems dpa' _chen po _rnams _dang*_/_sangs rgyas _rnams _la _skyes bu chen po _zhes _bya _ste/__de dag _skyes bu chen po _yin pas _'di dag _gis _brjod _cing _mngon par _bsal bar _byed pa'i _phyir _skyes bu'i _chen po'i _mtshan _rnams _so/__/'o na _de dag _gis _yan lag _dang*_/_nying lag _rnams _la _skyes bu chen por _mngon par _byed pa _gang _la _yang _bye brag _med pa'i _phyir/__'di snyed cig _go _zhes bya bar _mi _rung bas _sum _cu _rtsa _gnyis _zhes bya ba'i _grangs _don med _par _'gyur _ro _zhe na/__de yang _bden _mod _kyi _'on kyang _thos pa _dang*_/_dran pa _dag _las _de'i _rjes su 'brang ba'i _don _de lta bu'i _grangs _nges par _bstan _te/__'dir _yang _grangs _'di nyid _kyis _bstan _to/__/mtshan _'di _rnams _kyang _mdor bstan pa _dang*_/_bshad pa _dang*_/_rgyu _dang*_/_'bras bu _dang*_/_rnam pa _bzhis _bstan _te/__dang po _ni _mdor bstan pa'o/__/de'i _'og _tu _mtshan _de _rnams _'grel pa _ni _bshad pa'o/__/sngon gyi las _smos _dang*_/_'gro ba _'jug pa'i _'khor lo _shing rta _la sogs pa'i _'phang lo _lta bu'o/__/de yang _phyag _dang _zhabs _gnyis ka _la _'byung _ngo*_/_/'di'i _sngon gyi las _kyang _rnam pa _gnyis _te/__bla _ngo*_/_/chos nyan pa _dang*_/_phreng ba _rgyud pa _dang*_/_gtsug lag khang _dang*_/_mchod rten _gyi _gan _du 'gro ba _dang*_/_g.yog _byin pa _sbyin pa'i _pha rol _tu _phyin pas _bsdus pa _de'i _'bras _ni _mtshan _de dag _gis _'khor los _sgyur bar _gyur _nas _rab _tu _'byung bar _'gyur _ro/__/de'i _tshe _ni _mngon par rdzogs par _'tshang _mi _rgya _ste/__dper na _rgyal po _shang _ka _zhes bya ba _la sogs pa _lta bu'o/__/gang _gi _tshe _de dag _thams cad _rnam pa thams cad _du _yongs _su _rdzogs par _gyur pa _de'i _tshe _mngon par rdzogs par _'tshang _rgya _ste/__de bas na _rnam pa thams cad _yongs _su _rdzogs pa _de _na _zhes _gsungs _so/__/de _la _mdo sde _gzhan dag _las _mtshan _gzhan _dang _gzhan _dpal be'u _dang*_/_bkra shis _dang*_/_sdong _ris _dang*_/_bum pa _gang ba _dang _nya _sbrel ba _dang _rgyal mtshan _dang*_/_dung _dang*_/_khri _bzang po _dang*_/gdugs dkar po _dang*_/_rnga yab _la sogs pa _dag _kyang _ma _bstan _tam _zhe na/__de yang _bden _mod _kyi _gtso bor _gyur pa _do/__/spu _re re _nas _skye _zhing _g.yas _su _'khyil pa _zhes bya ba _ni _spu'i _khung bu _gcig _nas _spu _gcig _kho na _skye bas _na _spu _re re _skye ba'o/__/kyil kyil por _'khyil ba _ni _g.yas phyogs _su _'khyil ba _ste/__rgyan _gdub kor _sbrul _'khyil ba _lta bu'am/__sbrul _'khyil ba'i _zlum pa _lta bu _ste/__gnyis ka _yang _g.yas _su _'khyil ba'o/__/zhal la _mdzod spu'i _mtshan _mnga' ba _zhes bya ba _ni _smin mtshams _kyi _thig le'i _gnas _na _spu _mnyen zhing _'jam _la kha _dog _dkar _zhing _snum pa/__drangs _na _khru _gang _ngam _khru _do 'am _khru _gsum _la sogs pa'i _srid _du _'byung _la _slar _btang _na/__g.yas _su _'khyil ba _rtse mo _gyen _du _phyogs pa _dang*_/_shing tog _skyu ru ra _tsam _la _dngul _gyi _sgo nga _'dra ba _gang _gi _zhal _na _mdzes par _'dug pa _de _la _zhal la _mdzod spu'i _mtshan _mnga' ba _zhes _bya'o/__/mtshan _'di _gnyis _kyi _sngon gyi las _kyang*_/_'du 'dzi _spangs pas _ni _spu _re re _bar _gyur _to/__/pha ma _la sogs pa _ji ltar _rigs pa'i _seng ge'i _lta bu _zhes bya ba _ni _de'i _ro stod _seng ge'i _ro stod _'dra ba'i _phyir _seng ge'i _ro stod _lta bu _ste _brang _gi _dbyes _yangs _shing _che _la _sha rgyas pas _spangs _shing _che ba _phun sum tshogs pa'i _phyir _de skad _ces _bya'o/__/dpung mgo _legs par _grub pa _zhes bya ba _la/__legs pa'i _sgra _ni _zlum pa _la _bya'o/__/grub pa'i _sgra _ni _mgul pa _rtsa'i _dra ba _mi mngon _dang _'dra ba _dang*_/_mgul _mdzes pa'i _rgyu _yin _no/__/gzhan _la _mi _smod pa _ni _seng ge _ltar _yangs pa'i _rgyu'o/__/snyan par smra ba _dang*_/_legs par _smra ba _brjod pa _dang*_/_seng ge'i _do/__/tha na _til _gyi _'brum bu _tsam _zhig _gsol _na _yang _sku _thams cad _du _khyab par _'gyur _ro/__/ro _thams cad _kyi _zhal _du _bcug _na/__bdud rtsi'i _ro _dang _'dra bar _'gyur _te/__de _ni _mtshan _gyi _las _so/__/sngon gyi las _dang _mthun pa _ni _go _sla'o/__/shing _n+ya gro _d+ha ltar _chu zheng gab pa _zhes bya ba _'di _la kha _cig _na re _n+ya gro _zhes bya ba _ni _ngan pa _do/__/de bas na _de dag _la _'bras bu _rnam par _dgod pa _yang _mi _bya'o/__/'phags pa'i _gang zag _rnams _la _ni _yongs _su _shes pa _yod pas _de'i _phyir _de dag _nyid _la _lam _dang _lam _ma yin pa _dang*_/_'bras bu _rnam par _dgod par _bya'o/__/gnas brtan _rab 'byor _gyis/__bcom ldan 'das _ci _lags _lam _la _bsgoms pas _'bras bu 'byung _bar _'gyur _ram _zhes bya ba _la sogs pas _ci _lam 'das _ci _lags/__chos nyid _'dus _bgyid _lags _sam/__'on te _'dus _ma _bgyid _lags _zhes bya ba _ci _las _dgongs _she na/__gang _gzugs _la sogs pa'i _chos _'di _rnams _kyi _chos nyid _de _gal te _'dus _dad _do _zhes _kyang _brjod _du _mi _rung ba'i _phyir _mi _ldan pa _yang _ma _yin _no/__/gzugs can ma _yin _zhing _rnam par mi rtog pa'i _phyir _gzugs _med pa'o/__/tshig _la sogs pas _bstan _tu _mi _ro/__/rab 'byor _stong pa nyid _ni _ci yang _med/_cung zad _kyang _med _ces bya ba _ni _ci yang _mi _byed pa'i _phyir _ci yang med pa'o/__/dngos po med pa'i _ngo bo nyid _yin pa'i _phyir _cung zad bzhin _du _tshor ba _la sogs pa _la _yang _sbyar bar _bya'o/__/byams pa _gang _kun brtags pa'i _gzugs _ni _rdzas su med par _blta bar _bya'o _zhes bya ba _ni _shin tu _med pa'i _phyir _ro/__/rnam par _tshul _gyi _'jig pa _dang*_/_gzugs _su _yod pa'i _phyir _rdzas _yin _te/__de bas _rnam par _brtags par _yod pa _nyid _dang*_/_rdzas _yin pa'i _phyir _bshad _do _zhes bya ba'i _tha tshig _go/__/rang _mi _rung _ste/__de bas na _rdzas su med pa'ang _ma _yin _no/__/rnam par _brtags pa'i _dngos po'i _rnam par _yod pa'i _phyir _yod _do _zhes _brjod _du _yang _mi _rung _ste/__de bas na _rdzas su yod pa _tu _phye _zhes bya ba'i _sgra _ni _ngo bo nyid _kyi _don _to/__/de bzhin _du _sangs rgyas _kyi _chos _kyi _mtha'i _bar _yang _sbyar bar _bya'o/__/de ltar _ngo bo nyid gsum _gyi _dbang _gis _mtshan _yang dag par _rdzogs pa'i byang chub _la _'dod pa _ma _btang bas _mya ngan _las _'das pa _mngon _du _byed _kyang _nges pa'i _nyan thos _ltar/__de _la _shin tu _drag po'i _mos pa _mi _skyed _de/__dper na _la la _zhig _grong _ngam _grong khyer _la _lta ba _na/__de nyid _du _gnas par _bya'o _snyam _du _bsams _te _bltas _na _ni/__der _mos par _mos pa _gzhan _du _'gyur _ro/__/gzhan _du 'gro'o _snyam _'gyur _la/__nges pa'i _nyan thos _rnams _kyang _rnam pa _gzhan _du _'gyur _ro/__/de bas na _nyon mongs pa _spangs _kyang _la la _bag chags _la sogs pa'i _dbang _gis _khyad par _du _'gyur _te/__snying rje'i bsam pa'i _dbang _gis _kyang*_/_de dag _'khor bas _shin tu _skyo bar _mi _'gyur _la/__sems can _la _phan pa _byed par _'dod pa _rnams _ni _bu _gzhon nu _mi gtsang ba'i _dong _du _ltung ba _'byin par _'dod pas _mi gtsang ba'i _dong _la _blta _yang*_/_des _skyo bar _mi 'gyur ba _bzhin _no/__/slob pa'am _mi slob pa _de lta bur _gyur pa _de dag _ni _de bzhin gshegs pa'i _man ngag _gis _'jig rten _las _'das pa _zag pa _med pa/__'phags pa'i _lam _la sogs pa'i _dge ba'i _rtsa ba _rnams _'di ltar _yongs _su _sngo bar _byed _de/__gang _bdag _gi _dge ba'i _rtsa ba _'jig rten _las _'das pa _zag pa _med pa _de dag _thams cad _sems can _la _phan pa'i _phyir _'khor bar _skye ba _la _mngon _du _phyogs par _gyur cig _ces _yongs _su _bsngo'o/__/de dag _de ltar _yongs _su _bsngos pa'i _dbang _gis _lam _de/__'di ltar _mdo sde _gzhan dag _las _blo gros _rgya mtsho _'khor ba'i rgyun _byed _la/__dge ba'i _rtsa ba _dang _mtshungs par _ldan pa'i _nyon mongs pa _de dag _gang zhe na/__'di lta ste _bsod _mi _'dor ba _dang*_/_pha rol _tu _phyin pa _la _sbyor ba _rnams _yongs _su _mi _gtong ba'o/__/blo gros _rgya mtsho _de dag _ni _dge ba'i _rtsa ba _dang _mtshungs par _ldan pa'i _nyon mongs pa _rnams _zhes _bgyi/__bka' _stsal pa/__blo gros _rgya mtsho _'di ltar _nyon mongs pa _de lta bu _dag _gis _byang chub sems dpa' _khams gsum _dang _'dre _zhing*_/_khams gsum pa _ni _nyon mongs pa _las _byung
